quote: Aʹbram added: “You have given me no offspring, and a member of my household is succeeding me as heir.”
And it extended south to the ascent of A·krabʹbim, passed over to Zin, then went up from the south to Kaʹdesh-barʹne·a, over to Hezʹron, up to Adʹdar, and went around toward Karʹka.
Then David congregated all Israel at Jerusalem to bring the Ark of Jehovah up to the place that he had prepared for it.
